bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with qian jia 嵌甲 , embedded nail. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry kui 葵 quoting Chuan xin shi yong fang Recipe book. Southern Song era, 1180. 傳信適用方 Lj: 手足甲忽然長，倒生刺肉如錐，痛不可忍 , “The nails of the hands and feet suddenly grow long. They turn around and pierce the flesh like an awl. The pain is unbearable”, writes: 肉錐怪疾 , “Queer ailment of flesh awl ”.
